item.title: OmniHex
item.description: LINKS Presentation of Previous Work (English) Research Proposal (Chinese) Repository readme below omniHex Dev Milestones [Dec 01 2021] Upgrade to ROS2: 100% [Dec 15 2021] PID and Newton-Euler Dynamics in SITL: 100% [Dec 31 2021] Real hardware drivers and maiden flight: 90% [Mar 01 2022] Adaptive MPC real flight: 0% [Apr 01 2022] Track trajectories and collect data: 0% [May 01 2022] Thesis writing: 0% Environment Setup Ubuntu 20.
